items.title: Stabilise API documentation
items.description: Confirm detected endpoints and classify authentication requirements.

risk.impact: Incorrect endpoint catalogue may block client migrations.
risk.mitigation: Review generated OpenAPI with engineering leads and add automated smoke tests.

items.title: Template parity audit
items.description: Enumerate Twig templates and map them to new React views.

risk.impact: Missing templates degrade UX during migration.
risk.mitigation: Prioritise high-traffic templates and create acceptance criteria.

items.title: Cron job remediation plan
items.description: Assess scheduled tasks and design equivalents for the asynchronous stack.

risk.impact: Unmigrated cron jobs can halt invoicing and notifications.
risk.mitigation: Document ownership, add monitoring, and schedule reimplementation on FastAPI workers.

items.title: Metrics coverage
items.description: Baseline key metrics (file counts, LOC, module sizes) for progress tracking.

risk.impact: Lack of metrics limits visibility into migration progress.
risk.mitigation: Integrate reports into CI dashboards and revisit quarterly.
